hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt wget -P /mnt http://cb2.igs.umaryland.edu/vmware_bundle.tgz tar xvzf vmware_bundle.tgz cp /mnt/image.vmdk vmware_bundle/image.vmdk sudo /opt/vappio-util/vp-bundle-vmx ./image.vmdk vmware_bundle/start_clovr.vmx.template vmware_bundle/start_clovr.vmx clovr_vmware_testing mv vmware_bundle clovr_vmware_testing tar cvzf clovr_vmware_testing.tgz clovr_vmware_testing
